title: The Culture DAO Avatar Committee Proposal #1:
body:
## **Summary**
The Culture DAO’s Avatar Committee is bringing its first project up for a vote. 


## **Abstract**
A proposal to create a series of 16,384 3D avatars, possessing traits with varying degrees of rarity - designed (by experienced professionals from the Visual Effects and Video Game, computer graphics industry), rigged and ready for use by developers and content creators within The Culture DAO community and beyond. 

This will be the first in a series of ‘Culture Creators’ projects. 

The project aims to deliver the avatars before the end of calendar year 2021.

Up to 500 $CULTUR may be sold by the community treasury to fund expenses associated with the avatars.

This is one of many projects around avatars being pursued by the Avatar Committee but the first to come to vote. 

## **Motivation**
The Culture DAO community wants to bring virtual beings, avatars and metaverse identity to the world. 

To that end, having our own avatar series which can represent Culture DAO membership could:
Drive technical innovation around avatars and virtual beings.
Build a sense of community among members.
Provide a visual representation of membership. 
Provide members with characters for use in their own projects.


## **Revenue Breakdown**
Any income generated from The Culture Creators Avatar series NFTs, both from initial mint and from residual sales shall be allocated in perpetuity according to these percentages:

* Each party will be responsible for any applicable taxes on their share of the revenue.


42.5% to the DAO Community Treasury to be put towards projects, including products and features both related and unrelated to The Culture Creators Avatars.


42.5% to The Project Creators to be allocated by The Project Creator, according to team member’s contributions on and commitment towards complete delivery of 16,384 fully functional Culture Creators Avatars.


15% to a pool mutually managed for 1) ongoing maintenance and support 2) carbon offsetting 3) unforeseen costs 4) equal redistribution between The Project Creators and the DAO when in excess supply. With distribution being controlled by mutual agreement between The Culture DAO and The Project Creators.

## **THE VOTE**
This vote seeks approval to pursue The Culture Creators Avatar NFT drop as a Culture DAO project. 

**YES** - Approve above Culture Creators Avatar project proposal

**NO** - Decline above Culture Creators Avatar project proposal in its current form.

Notice: Legal contracts and NFT smart contracts involving The Culture DAO may be generated as a consequence of the results of this vote.
author: 0xCe06624718AF906A3D168CCC2CAbB5b3f9d9cC7b
